title: How can DVDs and Blue ray disks be 'encrypted' anyway? - Quora

response.answer_text: They can't, really. Which is how libdvdcss  came into being. I need that on my Linux computer to play DVDs I have actually paid full retail price for. The media industry has spent a huge amount of money to try and make HD video hard to copy - High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection - but people still need to make films in the first place so they still need working video gear that can copy video.
